item.title: Escape to Bintan Lagoon Resort for a Global Wellness Day retreat
item.description: Bintan Lagoon Resort (BLR) is commemorating this year’s Global Wellness Day with a special getaway package full of wellness activities on June 10th and 11th. A quick 75-minute ferry trip from Singapore, BLR is nestled on 300 hectares of lush land, boasting a private 1.5km beach. With a wide range of over 50 indoor and outdoor activities, from adventurous to relaxing, and delicious, healthy culinary options, there’s something for everyone.
